SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.plugin.image.task.bean.scale

Class ScaleImageIndependently

Object
AnchorBean<Task<StackSequenceInput,NoSharedState>>
Task<StackSequenceInput,NoSharedState>
ScaleImage<NoSharedState>
ScaleImageIndependently
public class ScaleImageIndependently extends ScaleImage<NoSharedState>
Creates a scaled copy of images, treating each image independently, and without any padding or alignment.

When given input images of identical size, it will produce outputs of identical (scaled) size.

However, when given inputs of varying size, it will usually produce outputs of varying (scaled) size.

Author:
Owen Feehan

      Called once before all calls to Task.executeJob(org.anchoranalysis.experiment.task.ParametersUnbound<T, S>).
      Specified by:
      beforeAnyJobIsExecuted in class Task<StackSequenceInput,NoSharedState>
      Parameters:
      outputter - the output-manager for the experiment (not for an individual job)
      concurrencyPlan - available numbers of processors that can call Task.executeJob(org.anchoranalysis.experiment.task.ParametersUnbound<T, S>)
      inputs - a list of inputs, each will result in at least one call to Task.executeJob(ParametersUnbound).
      parameters - the experiment-parameters.
      Returns:
      the shared-state that is passed to each call to Task.executeJob(org.anchoranalysis.experiment.task.ParametersUnbound<T, S>) and to Task.afterAllJobsAreExecuted(S, org.anchoranalysis.io.output.outputter.InputOutputContext).
      Throws:
      ExperimentExecutionException - if a fatal error occurs executing this step of the experiment.
